title: masked_selected does not broadcast tensors
body_html:
torch.FloatTensor([[1,2],[3,4]]).masked_select(torch.ByteTensor([0,1])) return a runtime-error "nconsistent tensor size at /Users/soumith/code/builder/wheel/pytorch-src/torch/lib/TH/generic/THTensorMath.c:193".
But the docs says boardcastable tensors can work.
body_text:
